alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bennett County through 545 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Cody, or 20 miles southeast of Martin, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuthill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
